data.text:
The Pride Group of Hotels is an eminent Indian hospitality brand with a presence in major cities across the country. Envisioned by Mr. S. P. Jain in 1988, we focus on extending warm hospitality with an Indian touch. With a network of 20 hotels that will continue to grow in the future, we take pride in creating exceptional experiences.
